price: 27. Hadday waxa dhulka ku sugan oo geedo ah qalimmo noqdaan, badduna (ku taakuleyso khad) iyadoo toddobo badood ay kaydsiinayaan, ma dhammaadeen Kelmedaha (amarrada) Alle. Hubaal Alle waa Adkaade Sare, Xakiim ah.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن شَجَرَةٍ أَقۡلَٰمٞ وَٱلۡبَحۡرُ يَمُدُّهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡحُرٖ مَّا نَفِدَتۡ كَلِمَٰتُ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaw annamā fī al-arḍi min shajaratin aqlāmun wal-baḥru yamudduhu min baʿdihi sabʿatu abḥurin mā nafidat kalimātu al-lahi inna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
